highlights: Fixed critical bug preventing specific version downloads with version() parameter
Root cause: Update deletes files → metadata still exists → integrity check recovery flow overrides requested version
Improved UX: Better 'already at version' message
Standardized all horizontal lines to 60 dashes for consistency
bug_fixes: Bug #1: Parameter passing - Added quotes when passing domain/lang/version parameters
Bug #2: Integrity check - Only override user-requested version when version is 'latest'
Bug #3: Integrity check - Skip when files don't exist (no point checking integrity of missing files)
Bug #4: Integrity check - Changed from 5% tolerance to exact byte match (actual_size != stored_size)

versions.notes: Major infrastructure upgrade with API v1, Schema 1.0, and comprehensive tooling
highlights: New registream command with subcommands (info, config, update, stats, version, cite)
API v1 migration with RESTful endpoints (/api/v1/datasets/{domain}/{type}/{lang}/{version})
Schema 1.0 support with improved column names (variable → variable_name) and validation
Case-insensitive domain and language parameters (automatically normalized to lowercase)
Three-mode configuration system (Offline/Standard/Full) with first-run setup
Usage tracking with local logging and optional anonymous telemetry
Automatic update check with 24-hour caching and persistent notifications
File integrity verification and metadata tracking (datasets.csv)
Intelligent user prompts with version choice options
Development mode infrastructure with clean function-based overrides
Comprehensive test suite with 14 test files (100% pass rate)
6 new Stata utility modules for modular architecture (_rs_config, _rs_usage, _rs_updates, etc.)
Complete documentation overhaul (14 new documentation files)
breaking_changes: Schema 1.0 required - users must re-download all datasets (column renamed: variable → variable_name)
v1.0.1 users can continue using v1.0.1 with Schema 0.5 datasets and legacy API routes
new_features: First-run interactive configuration setup with three modes
Version choice prompts when datasets are missing
Schema validation with clear error messages

versions.notes: URL migration and CSV apostrophe parsing fix
highlights: Migrated API host from registream.com to registream.org
Fixed CSV apostrophe parsing error in autolabel command
Re-exported SCB datasets with improved handling of special characters
bug_fixes: Fixed apostrophe handling in CSV data when displaying variable definitions

versions.notes: Initial public release of RegiStream for Stata
highlights: Automatic variable and value labeling from SCB metadata
Support for English and Swedish languages
Schema v0.5 with basic metadata structure
Legacy API routes (/data/{file}.zip)
autolabel command for variables and values
